document.full_text: u.s. director terrence malick won the palme d'or for best picture at the cannes film festival sunday for "the tree of life," a meditative, metaphysical epic starring brad pitt and sean penn.
document.title: terrence malick epic wins palme d'or in cannes
lines_and_colors: u.s. director terrence malick won the palme d'or for best picture at the cannes film festival sunday for "the tree of life," a meditative, metaphysical epic starring brad pitt and sean penn.
